ygData.subject: Ice Comet
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ive herd some stories of people failing on the actual research part of the quest multiple times.  Ive seen auctions from people now for IC scrolls
ygData.messageBody:
>Just got the Staff of the Wheel and Star of Eyes. Was wondering about others
>experience with researching Ice Comet in terms of failing to make spell. I'm
>not planning on trying anyway until level 50, almost level 49 now. Has
>anyone failed to make the scroll or know of anyone who has failed? Would
>hate to have to collect all those rods again.
>
>Also, anyone know of any good places for experience at levels 48-50 other
>than sol b or lower guk? Those places are way too camped. I go to Kedge when
>I can, but need a group for that. Verant waited far too long to make more
>higher level places to hunt. I do not like guard hunting because I hate to
>be KOS in places I may want to visit later. Any ideas appreciated.
>
>Kronan, level 48 wiz on Innoruuk

Ive herd some stories of people failing on the actual research part of the
quest multiple times. Ive seen auctions from people now for IC scrolls
(premade) in a few zones, even have gotten a tell or two from people trying
to sell IC spells to wizards. Kinda weird I got my first tell asking if I
wanted to buy an IC scroll not 5 min after I hit 46.
Personally I'll probably go the route of buying the spell from someone
else. I am not that crazy about doing the quest again to get the staff.
Ive herd that its Unwise to attempt to research level 49 spells unless you
have about 140 in research skill. Im at about 130 now, and assuming I can
find Astral Runes I'll train the extra points and just do the work myself.

5.5 bubbles to 49

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
